data: {"generalSituation":"A replenishment of the northeast monsoon will affect Guangdong tomorrow, it will be cool in the morning over the region. Under the influence of a strong easterly airstream, it will be mainly cloudy and windy over the coast of Guangdong in the following couple of days. Another surge of the northeast monsoon will reach the coast of southern China over the weekend. The weather will be appreciably cooler over the region early next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260128","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
